parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.21</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Arguments</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Waypoints </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns the position of a selected waypoint of a given group. Waypoints include only those which were placed in the mission editor. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''getWPPos''' [group, index] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> [group, index]: [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> group: [[Group]] - the group/unit, of which you want to select a waypoint </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> index: [[Number]] - 0 equals the starting position of the group.<br>
The number used in this and other waypoint commands is ''one more'' than the one displayed in the waypoint window in the editor. (i.e. if the editor labeled a WP <tt>"0:MOVE"</tt> the you would have to use <tt>getWPPos [grp,1]</tt> to access this particular WP)</value></part><part><name>PARAMETER3</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] - format [[Position3D]]. 
The returned position equals [0,0,0], if the selected waypoint doesn't exist. </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[_group1,1] [[setWPPos]] [200,600,0];<br>_pos <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> [[getWPPos]] [_group1,1];</code>

returns [200,600,0] </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[setWPPos]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>
